```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggtree)
```

```{r update.TREE, cache = TRUE}
library("ggplot2")
nwk <- system.file("extdata", "sample.nwk", package="ggtree")
tree <- read.tree(nwk)
p <- ggtree(tree) + geom_point(subset=.(!isTip),
        	       color="#b5e521", alpha=1/4, size=10)
p %<% rtree(30)



```
